Package com.javaeedev.lightweight.mvc

Interface Summary
Action Prototype Action that execute for handle http request.
ExceptionResolver Interface of exception resolver to handle exception.
Interceptor Intercept action's execution like servlet Filter, but interceptors are configured and managed by IoC container.
InterceptorChain Holds all interceptors as a chain.
ServletContextAware Module implements this interface allowing to get a ServletContext object.
ViewResolver To resolve and render a view.
 

Class Summary
ActionContext Wrap all servlet's objects and can be retrieved via thread local.
DispatcherServlet Core dispatcher servlet.
ModelAndView A ModelAndView object contains a model and a view.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Order Specify orders.
